summary: This is an FBI interview summary (302 form) of a female witness interviewed at the Palm Beach County Resident Agency. She describes being recruited as a teenager by a man named TONY LNU to give a massage for money, which led to an encounter at a Palm Beach residence where she massaged Jeffrey Epstein, who masturbated during the session and paid her $200. She identified Epstein from a photograph.

persons.name: Ambrose
persons.role: Friend of the witness and travel companion
persons.context: Friend of the witness who was approximately one year older. Ambrose drove the witness to the Palm Beach residence for the massage appointment and remained downstairs during the incident.

persons.name: Tony Lnu
persons.context: An 18-19 year old male who approached the witness and told her she could make money by giving a massage to an older man. He provided her with a phone number to set up the appointment.

persons.name: Chaz Lnu
persons.context: Lived in Royal Palm Beach. The witness and Ambrose met Tony LNU at Chaz LNU's home.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The older man the witness was recruited to massage. She identified him from a photograph. He masturbated during the massage on his back and paid her $200. She believed he was angry at how the session ended.

connections.description: Ambrose and the witness were introduced to Tony LNU by another friend. They met him at Chaz LNU's home.
Tony LNU recruited the witness for a paid massage with an older man, who was later identified as Jeffrey Epstein. This suggests Tony LNU had knowledge of or connection to Epstein's activities.
Ambrose drove the witness to Epstein's Palm Beach residence and was present in the home during the incident, though remained downstairs.

events.title: Recruitment and Massage Incident
events.description: The witness, then a teenager, was recruited by Tony LNU to give a paid massage. She and Ambrose went to a Palm Beach residence where she massaged Jeffrey Epstein. During the massage, Epstein masturbated and attempted to touch her. She ended the session and was paid $200.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness
events.description: The witness was interviewed by FBI agents at the Palm Beach County Resident Agency. She provided details of the massage incident and identified Jeffrey Epstein from a photograph.

keyFacts: A witness described being recruited as a teenager by a man named Tony LNU to give a paid massage to an older man, later identified as Jeffrey Epstein.
During the massage at a Palm Beach residence, Epstein masturbated under a towel and attempted to touch the witness, who ended the session.
Epstein paid the witness $200 in cash after the incident. The witness believed he was angry at how it concluded.
The witness was driven to the appointment by her friend Ambrose, who waited downstairs. Approximately 3-4 other girls were also present at the residence.
The witness identified Jeffrey Epstein from a photograph shown to her by FBI agents during her interview on November 16, 2010.
